scripts.start:dev: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --wait && turbo dev --ui=stream
scripts.db:restart: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d
scripts.db:reset: docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --wait
scripts.gen:contract: pnpm --filter api gen-schema && node scripts/sync-api-contract.mjs && pnpm --filter @digisay/api-contract generate && pnpm --filter @digisay/api-contract build
